bibl.title: Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008
bibl.note: Réflexion sur les arts de l'Égypte romaine (en part. sur la sculpture).
BERGMANN Marianne, Stile und Ikonographien im kaiserzeitlichen Ägypten.

Katja LEMBKE, Martina MINAS-NERPEL and Stefan PFEIFFER (Edd.), Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008 = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 41 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 1-36, 13 figg.
